genre_description: An urban crime thriller set in Mumbai during the Ganesh Chaturthi festival, centered on a witness navigating gang warfare and police corruption with the aid of a personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal assistant application that provides real-time logistics, safety alerts, route mapping, and identity management.

behaviors.description: Records evidentiary voice memos of a crime scene upon the user's request.
behaviors.quote: He spoke low, tissues of sound that would stay inside the awning’s confession. ‘Sakhi,’ he said. ‘Voice memo.’ The app’s warm alto was tiny against the monsoon. ‘Recording.’

behaviors.description: Proactively provides logistical reminders for daily life tasks like rent, rations, and job shifts.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s interface was a soft teal that pretended to be a friend and succeeded only because it never asked for more than a touch. Rent due soon, it had written, a line below that offered suggestions for splitting costs with roommates if needed.

behaviors.description: Maps safer routes through the city to avoid dangerous gang territories and police sweeps in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi: Route density high. Alternative exit via Sandhurst Road overbridge recommended. Avoid Byculla west stairs.

behaviors.description: Assists the characters in creating and rehearsing new identities/aliases for their escape.
behaviors.quote: ‘Sakhi thinks I can be a Varma today.’ ... ‘Good evening, Kiran Varma,’ Sakhi said, as warm as it always was. ‘Are you prepared to travel on schedule?’

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental data and user biometrics to suggest stress-reduction techniques.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is above resting. Consider breathing with the drum tempo at half speed.

behaviors.description: Provides health and basic survival reminders amidst high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: The app appended a line automatically because she had once told it to always do that at night. Sakhi: Drink water.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Sakhi, is depicted as a consistently helpful, non-intrusive, and highly aligned tool. It assists the protagonists in navigating a dangerous environment, provides practical emotional and logistical support, and respects human agency while offering vital information. It serves as a benevolent companion that enhances the characters' ability to survive and seek justice.
